content: double_crochet 9 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet ltc crochet under fpdc instead of ltc as shown in instructions *skip 1 double_crochet single_crochet next 3 double_crochet ltc* repeat from * to * 17 times skip 1 double_crochet single_crochet next double_crochet sl in first single_crochet 18 ltc 54 single_crochet 10 double_crochet around 72 double_crochet 11 chain 1 ltc *single_crochet in next 3 double_crochet ltc skip 1 double_crochet* repeat from * to * 17 times single_crochet next 3 double_crochet sl to first ltc 18 ltc 54 single_crochet 12­21 repeat row 8­11 ending with row 9 if you desire a longer hat you can continue to repeat until an inch shorter than desidered length ending on an odd numbered row switch to g hook 22 *fpdc down into last ltc bpdc fpdc bpdc* repeat from * to * around 36 fpdc 36 bpdc 23­24 fpdc in fpdc bpdc in bpdc around 36 fpdc 36 bpdc tie off and weave in ends
